item.title: Force Sync Master with Dev Branch via Pull Request
item.description: Goal: Make master branch identical to dev branch when merge conflicts are unresolvable, using a pull request workflow. Get the target commit cd /path/to/repository/root git checkout dev git log -n 1 Copy the commit SHA (e.g., b2ed68964660648860bcf41d096e71b5d49226ae). Create sync branch git checkout master git checkout -b sync-with-dev Replace all content ## Remove everything git rm -rf . ## Restore from dev commit (replace SHA with your commit) git checkout b2ed68964660648860bcf41d096e71b5d49226ae -- .
